entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:51 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nagagami 12:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -11.5°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Light snow. Blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 before morning. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
